text: Allah upama dicchena aparera adhikarabhukta ekajana dasera -- kono-kichura upare se ksamata rakhe na, ara emana eka byaktira yake amadera tarapha theke uttama jibika diye amara bharanaposana karechi, sutaram se ta theke gopane o prakasye kharaca kare. Tara ki samana-samana? Samasta prasansa allahâ€Œra. Kintu tadera adhikansa'i jane na.
